description: Finds a place by its unique ID. A PlaceId is returned by other search operations.

parameters.name: IndexName
parameters.description: The name of the place index resource that you want to use for the search.

parameters.name: PlaceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the place to find.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: The preferred language used to return results. The value must be a valid BCP 47 language tag, for example, en for English. This setting affects the languages used in the results, but not the results themselves. If no language is specified, or not supported for a particular result, the partner automatically chooses a language for the result. For an example, we'll use the Greek language. You search for a location around Athens, Greece, with the language parameter set to en. The city in the results will most likely be returned as Athens. If you set the language parameter to el, for Greek, then the city in the results will more likely be returned as ÎÎ¸Î®Î½Î±. If the data provider does not have a value for Greek, the result will be in a language that the provider does support.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: The full name and address of the point of interest such as a city, region, or country. For example, 123 Any Street, Any Town, USA.

nested_items.name: Point
nested_items.description: A single point geometry specifies a location for a Place using WGS 84 coordinates:
x -- Specifies the x coordinate or longitude.
y -- Specifies the y coordinate or latitude.

nested_items.name: AddressNumber
nested_items.description: The numerical portion of an address, such as a building number.

nested_items.name: Street
nested_items.description: The name for a street or a road to identify a location. For example, Main Street.

nested_items.name: Neighborhood
nested_items.description: The name of a community district. For example, Downtown.

nested_items.name: Municipality
nested_items.description: A name for a local area, such as a city or town name. For example, Toronto.

nested_items.name: SubRegion
nested_items.description: A county, or an area that's part of a larger region. For example, Metro Vancouver.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: A name for an area or geographical division, such as a province or state name. For example, British Columbia.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: A country/region specified using ISO 3166 3-digit country/region code. For example, CAN.

nested_items.name: PostalCode
nested_items.description: A group of numbers and letters in a country-specific format, which accompanies the address for the purpose of identifying a location.

nested_items.name: Interpolated
nested_items.description: True if the result is interpolated from other known places.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the time zone, following the IANA time zone standard. For example, America/Los_Angeles.

nested_items.name: Offset
nested_items.description: The time zone's offset, in seconds, from UTC.

nested_items.name: UnitType
nested_items.description: For addresses with a UnitNumber, the type of unit. For example, Apartment.

nested_items.name: UnitNumber
nested_items.description: For addresses with multiple units, the unit identifier. Can include numbers and letters, for example 3B or Unit 123.

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: The Amazon Location categories that describe this Place.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SupplementalCategories
nested_items.description: Categories from the data provider that describe the Place that are not mapped to any Amazon Location categories.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SubMunicipality
nested_items.description: An area that's part of a larger municipality. For example, Blissville is a submunicipality in the Queen County in New York.
